title: High Transparency and Accountability
description: In 2023, Saint Lucia achieved a CPIA transparency, accountability, and corruption in the public sector rating of 4.5, indicating a relatively high level of transparency and accountability in its public sector.

title: Low Aid from Sweden
description: In 2015, Saint Lucia received net bilateral aid flows from DAC donors, Sweden, amounting to approximately $10,000, one of the lowest amounts globally.
